subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
lead_paragraph: Donovan, a 300-pound tackle on the Baltimore Colts’ championship teams in 1958 and 1959, was known for his self-deprecating modesty.
snippet: Donovan, a 300-pound tackle on the Baltimore Colts’ championship teams in 1958 and 1959, was known for his self-deprecating modesty.
